title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, clicking cancel in the progress dialog does not have any effect.
EB: When clicking cancel in the progress dialog while adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, the addition of the exception breakpoint should be cancelled and have no effect.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective
2) Click the J! button to add an exception
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
